body:
Actually this worked for me! :+1: But the main reason for this issue is still unclear. I tried to a to create the `resetlog.txt` like described in [https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/299357](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/299357) with the commands below but i got no file. Maybe this file would have had some advices to track down the error. Thanks anyway!

```
C:\Users\Frank>netsh
netsh>winsock
netsh winsock>reset c:\resetlog.txt
```
